SLAC-PUB-12820
e + e − Annihilations into Quasi-two-body Final States
at 10.58 GeV
Kai Yi
Stanford Linear Accelerator Center
Menlo Park, California 94025, USA
* E-mail: yik@slac.stanford.edu
We report the first observation of e + e − annihilations into hadronic states of
positive C-parity, ρ 0 ρ 0 and φρ 0 . The angular distributions support two-virtual-
photon annihilation production. We also report the observations of e + e − → φη
and a preliminary result on e + e − → ρ + ρ − .
Keywords: Exclusive; High momentum; C parity; Helicity amplitude.
